price: 110. Hubaal Wuxuu (Alle) Og yahay hadalka kii kor loo qaado, wuxuuna Og yahay waxaad qarineysaan.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra mina al-qawli wayaʿlamu mā taktumūna
